preamble.P:
You have reached the logically existing, virtual ACE+TAO+CIAO scoreboard. It shows all the OS/compiler combinations ACE+TAO+CIAO are tested against everyday, all over the world. We have builds running continuously at ISIS, Vanderbilt University, Remedy IT, Riverace Corporation, Micro Focus, Object Computing Inc.
The distributed scoreboard is divided into following categories:
ACE/TAO/CIAO builds for release with test statistics integrated
ACE Builds for Release [regular|rss]
ACE Builds for Future Release [regular]
TAO Builds for Release [regular|rss]
TAO Builds for Future Release [regular]
CIAO Builds for Release [regular|rss]
CIAO Builds for Future Release [regular]
DDS Builds for Release [regular|rss]
TAO X11 Builds for Release [regular]
XSC Builds for Release [regular]
CoSMIC Builds for Release [regular]
Miscellaneous Builds
Integrated page having all the above in a single page for folks who like it!
If you'd like to contribute builds to our virtual scoreboard please contact us and let us know which platform combinations you can contribute. Instructions for setting up your own daily build and scoreboard are available here.
We use the daily builds as a basis to collect important metrics like compilation time, footprint and performance details. Please refer to this page for more details.
Additional Development Process Related Pages
In addition to the build results found in the Scoreboard described above, a number of other ACE/TAO/CIAO/DAnCE development process related web pages we use are the following:
Coverity Scan for Static Analysis and Test Coverage
Compile- and Run-Time Statistics
Text based test statistics
Footprint statistics:
Regular,
CORBA e/compact,
CORBA e/micro
CORBA e/micro single threaded
Minimum CORBA
The Coverity Scan pages illustrate which areas of ACE+TAO+CIAO+DAnCE code are used, and how frequently. The Compile- and Run-Time pages contain compilation times, static footprint measurements, and performance metrics.
